Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 44th overall pick, by San Diego in 2010...
Traded from San Diego to Houston on 4/15/2011 (Going to SDN: LF J. Bay, P A. Pena. Going to HOU: P J. McLovin, P B. Haris, P C. House, CF C. Maybin, CF M. Taylor)...
Earned first career win on 5/17/2012...
Had first career hit on 6/20/2012, off Miguel Gonzalez (CHN)...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 6/9/2013 (Going to HOU: C E. Llamas, P L. McCullers, P J. Weaver. Going to PIT: P J. McLovin)...
Injured on 9/19/2013 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/2/2016, off Chris Stratton (MIL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2017, going 5-0, 1.42...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 6/30/2020 (Going to PIT: P D. Baeza. Going to LAA: P J. McLovin)...
Injured on 7/9/2020 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2022...
